paper_abstract: We present a novel finite element integration method for low-order elements on GPUs. We achieve more than 100GF for element integration on first order discretizations of both the Laplacian and Elasticity operators on an NVIDIA GTX285, which has a nominal single precision peak flop rate of 1 TF/s and bandwidth of 159 GB/s, corresponding to a bandwidth limited peak of 40 GF/s.
